subject: Reply soon
msgSnippet: Hi, Iam familiar in writing testcases for bussiness objects using JUnit and now iam trying to write the testcase for the servlets for which iam making use of
messageBody:
Hi,
        Iam familiar in writing testcases for bussiness objects using JUnit and now iam trying to write the testcase for the servlets for which iam making use of Cactus.I have set the path for commons-cactus.jar.I have used import statements like...
import org.apache.commons.cactus.*;
import org.apache.commons.cactus.util.*;

Iam able to compile the java files while run time it is throwing the following exception

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find resource for base name cactus, locale en_US
        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:423)
        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:339)
        at org.apache.commons.cactus.client.AbstractHttpClient.<clinit>(AbstractHttpClient.java:82)
        at java.lang.FloatingDecimal.<clinit>(FloatingDecimal.java:1662)
        at org.apache.commons.cactus.AbstractTestCase.runBare(AbstractTestCase.java:266)

I will be very grateful to you if you send me the solution asap

regards,
Sandhya Sree
